parameters.name: ChangeSetId
parameters.description: The ID of the change set.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the change set. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~131035~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ShowTemplate
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to obtain the template. Valid values:

*   true
*   false (default)
